t: How to write an Amazon-style narrative memo
s: January 18, 2023 - Strip that out. You should feel free to weave narrative stories if you want, but when you’re describing business results, be specific and measurable. So instead of “our brand awareness is increasing” you should write “brand awareness grew 15% during 2022”.

s: November 13, 2023 - The Amazon 6-pager method provides a streamlined approach to internal communications. It helps different teams with varying understandings of a project align their perspectives. This method presents ideas in a concise, comprehensive manner to foster meaningful discussions.
